title: Any Rioters out here who can help me? i have a small situation.
body:
I was playing in a normal match like just 30 mins ago maybe, and lol just closed no bugsplat no nothing. so i quickly opened it hoping not to get an afk ban and to get back in and help the team asap. but then lol updated itself and took like 15-20 mins i then logged back on and got afk pens the 5x20 min ones. is it possible to get them lifted as lol closed and updated on me? has 5.18 rolled out already?

ty {{champion:92}}
